name: At the end, the beginning
description:
At the end, the beginning presents us an alchemist in the search of the eternal life. In this journey, he discovers a dungeon in which a strange creature promises him his awaited reward. 

The only thing that he needs to do is to get to the final room of the dungeon to be immortal until the end of eternity. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Game developed for an academic purpose.

Developers:

Adrián Torres 

Fernando Palazuelo 

Pablo Martín 

Xabier Villanueva
